com.sleepycat.client

Class BdbServerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sleepycat.client.BdbServerConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class BdbServerConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A connection with a specific BDB server.

    BdbServerConnection is not thread-safe. Objects created from a connection use the connection internally, therefore they are not thread-safe either. A connection together with all objects created from it should only be accessed from a single thread. For example, a connection, an environment handle opened from it and a database handle opened from the environment handle, all three objects should be accessed from the same thread. It is an error to access the environment handle and the database handle from different threads.

      • connect

        public static BdbServerConnection connect(java.lang.String host,
                                          int port)
                                   throws SDatabaseException
        Open a new connection to the specified BDB server.
        Parameters:
        host - the server's host URL
        port - the server's listening port
        Returns:
        a new connection
        Throws:
        BdbConnectionException - if an error occurred while connecting to the server
        SDatabaseException - if any error occurs

      • connectSsl

        public static BdbServerConnection connectSsl(java.lang.String host,
                                             int port,
                                             SslConfig sslConfig,
                                             int timeout)
                                      throws SDatabaseException
        Open a new SSL connection to the specified BDB server.
        Parameters:
        host - the server's host URL
        port - the server's listening port
        sslConfig - the SSL configuration
        timeout - the timeout in milliseconds for each remote request, zero as an infinite timeout
        Returns:
        a new connection
        Throws:
        BdbConnectionException - if an error occurred while connecting to the server
        SDatabaseException - if any error occurs

      • openEnvironment

        public SEnvironment openEnvironment(java.lang.String home,
                                    SEnvironmentConfig config)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    SDatabaseException
        Open a remote environment and return an environment handle.
        Parameters:
        home - the environment's home directory. The directory must specified as a relative path
        config - the environment attributes. If null, system default attributes are used
        Returns:
        an environment handle
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the environment does not exist or cannot be accessed
        SResourceInUseException - if the environment is being recovered or deleted
        SDatabaseException - if any error occurs

      • close

        public void close()
        Close this connection.

        After closing this connection, all objects created from this connection must be discarded.
